data.name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Retribution Chaos Space Marines Race Pack
data.detailed_description:
Includes 4 unique ability and wargear items to equip your squad with.
  • SKULL BREAKER: Hits on the enemy with this weapon have the chance to cause an explosive area of effect attack.
  • ARMOR OF IMMORTAL: Gain the protection of an invulnerability shield when your character is critically injured.
  • HERALD OF THE WARP: Equipping this item significantly lowers your ability cooldown timers.
  • MARK OF CHAOS FAVOR: Your character gains the benefits of chaos god worship from all the dark gods.
data.about_the_game:
Includes 4 unique ability and wargear items to equip your squad with.
  • SKULL BREAKER: Hits on the enemy with this weapon have the chance to cause an explosive area of effect attack.
  • ARMOR OF IMMORTAL: Gain the protection of an invulnerability shield when your character is critically injured.
  • HERALD OF THE WARP: Equipping this item significantly lowers your ability cooldown timers.
  • MARK OF CHAOS FAVOR: Your character gains the benefits of chaos god worship from all the dark gods.

fullgame.name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II: Retribution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: Pentium IV 3.2Ghz, or any dual core processor
  • Memory: 1GB (XP), 1.5GB (Vista), 1.5 GB (Windows 7)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5GB space free
  • Video Card: 128 MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 (Nvidia GeForce 6600 GT / ATI X1600)
  • Other: Online Steam Account
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista, Windows 7
  • Processor: Any Core 2 , Athlon X2, or better
  • Memory: 2GB RAM or higher (XP, Vista, Windows 7)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5GB space free
  • Video Card: 256 MB Video Card using Shader Model 3 (Nvidia GeForce 7800GT or any Nvidia GT200 series or better, ATI X1900 or any HD3600 series or better
  • Other: Online Steam Account

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10.5
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB Memory
  • Hard Drive: 8GB HD space
  • Graphics: The game requires a 512mb NVIDIA 1xx series graphics card or better, a 512mb AMD 4xxx series graphics card or better, or an Intel HD4000 series card or better.
  • Other Requirements: The following graphics cards are not supported: ATI X1xxx series, ATI 2xxx series, Intel GMA series, Intel HD3000, Intel HD5300, Intel HD515, NVIDIA 7xxx series, NVIDIA 8xxx series, NVIDIA 3xx series.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11.6
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8GB Memory
  • Hard Drive: 8GB HD space
  • Graphics: The game requires a 2GB NVIDIA 7xx series graphics card or better, a 2GB AMD 6xxx series graphics card or better, or an Intel Iris Pro series card or better.
  • Other Requirements: The following graphics cards are not supported: ATI X1xxx series, ATI 2xxx series, Intel GMA series, Intel HD3000, Intel HD5300, Intel HD515, NVIDIA 7xxx series, NVIDIA 8xxx series, NVIDIA 3xx series.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit required)
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4GB Memory
  • Hard Drive: 8GB HD space
  • Graphics: The game requires a 1GB NVIDIA 6xx series graphics card or better, a 1GB AMD 6xxx series graphics card or better, or an Intel Iris Pro series card or better.*
  • Other Requirements: NVIDIA cards require driver version 367.35 (tested), AMD and Intel cards require MESA 11.2 (tested)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or Steam OS 2.0 (64 bit required)
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 8GB Memory
  • Hard Drive: 8GB HD space
  • Graphics: The game requires a 2GB NVIDIA 9xx series graphics card or better*
  • Other Requirements: NVIDIA cards require driver version 367.35 (tested).
